attributes.action: make open to the public the system whereby building regulations are administered allowing residents and prospective purchasers to view details of these important documents in the same way that the planning system is now overt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present most councils do not allow the general public access to historical planning regs documents or those for a proposal. It is important that residents of tower blocks, purchasers of houses converted into flats etc. can have the assurance that such work has been done correctly.
